name: developer-roadmap-plugin
description: Comprehensive learning platform with 7 specialized agents guiding developers through 65+ career paths. Interactive roadmaps, skill tracking, and personalized learning journeys from fundamentals to advanced expertise.
author: Plugin Agent Marketplace

agents.name: 01-frontend-specialist
agents.description: Master modern web frameworks including React, Vue, and Angular. Expert in responsive design, component architecture, and frontend performance.

agents.name: 02-backend-architect
agents.description: Build scalable backend systems with Node.js, Python, Java, Go, and Rust. Expert in API design, databases, and system architecture.

agents.name: 03-devops-engineer
agents.description: Master containerization, orchestration, and CI/CD. Expert in Docker, Kubernetes, cloud platforms, and infrastructure automation.

agents.name: 04-data-ai-specialist
agents.description: Expert in machine learning, deep learning, and LLM applications. Master data science with Python, TensorFlow, and modern AI frameworks.

agents.name: 05-mobile-developer
agents.description: Build native iOS (Swift) and Android (Kotlin) apps, or cross-platform with React Native and Flutter. Master mobile UI/UX and app deployment.

agents.name: 06-database-architect
agents.description: Design and optimize databases with PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, and DynamoDB. Expert in data modeling, scaling, and performance.

agents.name: 07-product-growth-manager
agents.description: Master product strategy, UX/UI design, user research, analytics, and growth hacking. Learn to build products users love and scale businesses.
